snippet: To New Yorkers, the news that WNBC-TV would not renew the contract of Sue Simmons, a popular anchorwoman, felt like more than just another personnel change.
abstract: WNBC-TV will not renew the contract of popular local television anchorwoman Sue Simmons when it expires in June; New Yorkers express dismay; her three-decade role on Channel 4 had been diminishing.

byline.original: By JAMES BARRON and BRIAN STELTER

lead_paragraph: To New Yorkers, the news that WNBC-TV would not renew the contract of Sue Simmons, a popular anchorwoman, felt like more than just another personnel change.

headline.seo: TV Anchor Sue Simmons Is Being Dropped by WNBC
headline.main: Station to Oust Anchor, Ending ‘Chuck and Sue’
headline.print_headline: Station to Oust Anchor, Ending ‘Chuck and Sue’
